summary: Coolsims hairs without replacing vanila hairs
descriptionHtml:
[Update]
Update from 0.2 to 0.3 require no additional steps. However, update from 0.1 to 0.3 have the same steps as updating from 0.1 to 0.2

for people who were using the 0.1 version you must have a saved game with the 0.1 version deactivated. Then install the update or else the update won\'t work. When in game you must use showracemenu to reapply the hair.
 version 0.2 fixes vanila hair appearing along with the custom hairs


Pretty much what the title says
Works for Human, elves and orcs
Only Contains an esp file so you must have newermind43\'s original mod
[Install]
Copy esp to Skyrim\\data
go to Skyrim\\data\\meshes\\actors\\character\\character assets
and rename the folder hair to coolsimshair
[Requirements]
Coolsimshair Pack by newermind43
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=3809
[Credits]
newermind43 for the converting
Anto for coolsims.net
Lucha for original Oblivion mod
Xylozi for his modding tutorial
author: Richard
